title: Setting up tutorial.js
text:
Using tutorial.js is simple. Include it as a script in an HTML file: 
<script src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fdavidcl/tutorial.js/master/tutorial.min.js" />
You can use the default CSS file to give text and buttons some style: 
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fdavidcl/tutorial.js/gh-pages/css/tutorialjs_default.css" />
Then just compose as many JSON files as you want, each one containing a 'step' of the tutorial, with this structure: 
{
   "title": "My first tutorial",
   "text": "This will be the content",
   "image": "someimage.jpg",
   "options": {
      "Next": "nextstep.json"
   }
}
